byline.contributor: Laure Fourquet contributed reporting from Paris, Melissa Eddy from Berlin and Francesca Barber from New York.

abstract: Reports by French newspaper Paris Match and German publication Bild of discovery of video showing final moments aboard Gemanwings plane that crashed in French Alps has been causing stir in Europe, but video itself has yet to surface; some have questioned its existence, while others have criticized newspaper for irresponsible reporting on its contents.
lead_paragraph: The French police asserted that the reports about it were false and the French prosecutor leading the crash investigation said no videos had been recovered.

headline.main: Doubts Intensify About Reports of a Video Made During Germanwings Flight’s Final Moments
headline.print_headline: Doubts Surface About Reports of a Video Made During Jet’s Final Moments

snippet: The French police asserted that the reports about it were false and the French prosecutor leading the crash investigation said no videos had been recovered.
